App Reference¶

This page documents the backend of the website in Flask. The idea is to parametrize each route through its request types.

app.tournament()[source]¶

The root page, or the tournament page, will allow quickly setting up and running a tournament. Features include a blind clock with blind configurations and table randomizer.

GET:

Poker Stats
